DOC.brief_title: A Six Week Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Study V565 Crohn 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This study multiple-site , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study approximately 126 subject confirm diagnosis CD least three month CD involve ileum and/or colon . Following screening period 28 day , subject randomly allocate one two treatment arm : either V565 placebo use 2:1 active : placebo ratio treatment period 6 week . Subjects treat study drug add-on permit stable medication already take CD .
